Articles.Content: I want to make a new biome for the Sun that starts somewhere after Eeloo's orbit, but I have no modding experience. How can I go about doing this?

What you're asking for is not a biome but a situation and altitude threshold. It sounds like you want to have In Space Low, In Space High, In Space Very High. Sadly, I don't think any mod enables this, but if any mod maker wanted this I think it would be doable.
Kerbalism has the ability to do this, but that whole science portion is still a WIP I think.
